text: The Moghbazar explosion took place on June 27, 2021, in Moghbazar, Dhaka, Bangladesh. investigations have been launched to know the exact reason of the gas explosion. ==Cause== There were gas cylinders at a restaurant at the ground floor of a three-storey building in the Moghbazar market while there were air conditioners at a showroom upstairs to the restaurant, There were gas cylinders as well at the road construction site at the scene where the restaurant cylinder burst along with other gas cylinders around creating a huge destructive blast, damaging Seven other nearby buildings and three buses in the explosion. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Asia Category:2020s explosions in Asia Category:2021 in Bangladesh Category:Dhaka Category:June 2021 events
title: Moghbazar explosion
